DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of cost-effectiveness of FDG-PET for the public health system in Brazil.
DOC.detailed_description: To provide detailed information about cost and effectiveness of FDG-PET in multiple oncological diseases, such as Lymphoma, lung cancer and esophageal cancer.
DOC.criteria: Cancer Other malignancy Uncontrolled Diabetes Pregnancy
DOC.keyword: Evaluate the cost impact in the evaluation of oncologic patients.
